definitions.definition: Goods which are or were offered or intended for sale.
examples: Good business depends on having good merchandise .

definitions.definition: Commercial goods connected (branded) with an entity such as a team, band, company, charity, work of fiction, festival, or meme.
examples: I saw a man selling Coldplay merchandise .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Goods which are or were offered or intended for sale.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) Commercial goods connected (branded) with an entity such as a team, band, company, charity, work of fiction, festival, or meme.
